pages.text: I do not worship what you worship
and you do not worship what I worship
and I will never worship what you worship
Neither will you worship what I worship
You have your own religion, and I have mine
When God's victory has come, together with His conquest
and you see people embracing God's religion in multitudes
exult your Lord's glory, and praise Him, and ask for His forgiveness; for He is ever-accepting of repentance
Doomed are the hands of Abu Lahab, and he is doomed too
His wealth and all that he gained would not help him
He will burn in a fire strongly glowing
and his wife as well, the carrier of firewood
Around her neck is a rope of palm fiber
